channel.title: Extending the run() method?
channel.description: here is my problem, BTW this isn't rsps this is a project I'm working on, OK, I need to know if its possible for 2 classes to use the same run() method, so for example, class A has the run() method, and class B wants to use it, is this possible if so how?

item.title: Extending the run() method?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Possible, however I’m not a fanatic of Java and shall redirect you to the correct section.

edit:

by implemeting runnable / extending thread, run() is inherited http://pastebin.com/3Sa9rTwJ
